title: Baked Mushroom, Spinach, and Chicken Gnocchi

Ingredients.3: 1 salt and ground black pepper to taste

Ingredients.10: 0.5 (3 pound) rotisserie chicken, boned and shredded

Directions.1: Position a rack in the upper third of the oven; preheat to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C).

Directions.2: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Cook until starting to soften, about 4 minutes. Transfer to a plate or bowl. Wipe out skillet.

Directions.3: Melt butter in the same skillet. Whisk in flour until a paste forms, about 3 minutes. Whisk in milk and broth until smooth. Simmer, whisking constantly, until thickened, about 5 minutes. Season with 1/2 teaspoon salt and nutmeg. Add mushrooms, chicken, gnocchi, and spinach to the sauce. Stir until gnocchi are coated and spinach wilts, about 3 minutes.

Directions.4: Pour mixture into a large baking dish. Sprinkle liberally with Parmesan cheese.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until bubbling, about 20 minutes.
